description:
QualCoder is free, open source software for qualitative data analysis. With QualCoder you can code text, images, audio and video, write journal notes and memos. You can categorise codes into a tree-like hierarchical categorisation scheme. Coding for audio and video requires the VLC media player. Coder comparison reports can be generated for text coding using the Cohen’s Kappa statistic. A graph displaying codes and categories can be generated to visualise the coding hierarchy. Most reports can be exported as html, open document text (ODT) or as plain text files.

![Screenshot](https://qualcoder.files.wordpress.com/2022/11/blue.png)
summary: Open source software for qualitative data analysis
author: Colin Curtain
